Kristin.action: Tells Lynn, 'There’s no way it was your fault. Come on. Calm down.'
Kristin.assessment: Kristin offers reassurance and attempts to comfort Lynn, showing empathy and support during a moment of distress.

Kristin.action: Skeptically responds to Lynn's feelings by saying, 'I‘m sure you're exaggerating.'
Kristin.assessment: While Kristin tries to calm Lynn, dismissing her feelings as exaggeration may indicate a lack of full emotional validation, which can reduce perceived warmth.
